title: [Completed] Unscheduled Luna and EU Burning World Channel Maintenance - January 31, 2024
content: The unscheduled maintenance has been completed. Thank you for your patience.

title: Community Livestream - v.248 Update Preview
content: Join Community Manager Jade in the next Community Livestream as she previews the upcoming events and contents in v.248 Strawberry Farm Festival.

title: v.248 - Strawberry Farm Festival Update Preview
content: Welcome to the Strawberry Farm Festival! In addition to helping Spiegelette with her farm, explore new events and the redesigned server selection screen!

title: Investigation of Scania and Kronos Cash Shop Issues - January 31, 2024
content: We are currently investigating the Scania and Kronos Cash Shop issues.

title: Cash Shop Update for January 31
content: Premium Surprise Style Box and more!

title: Miracle Winter - February 3 - Hats
content: This Saturday, February 3, 2024, Maplers on all Worlds will have Miracle Time enabled for Hat Equipment!
